name: conceptualization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act or process of forming an idea or principle in your mind: Doctors must have a broad conceptualization of end-of-life care and the legal issues that support it. We have witnessed a fundamental shift in the conceptualization of psychiatric disorders. See
conceptualize
More examplesFewer examples current theoretical conceptualizations about resilience This topic entails a different set of research questions, theoretical conceptualizations, and sources.In this investigation, a relatively broad conceptualization of adolescent antisocial behavior is used.
